name: Murder in the Manor
description:
You are Vincent Darcy Pentanguishine and there has been a foul murder in the South Kassanan Village of Lowdown...

Discover and use clues to help you interrogate the various suspects that live in the manor and make your arrest.

Find the killer. Bring them to justice.

(NOTE: This game was made using Processing and therefore has a few strange bugs, and will only register lower-case letter inputs. i.e. you are unable to walk around or access the inventory if you have caps lock enabled, im so very sorry).
